<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4514) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 72 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points but not immediately killed

</column>

---

Fierceness in battle runs through your blood, and you refuse to fall from your injuries no matter how terrible they may be. You avoid being knocked out and remain at 1 Hit Point, and your [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition increases by 1.

<title level="2">Orc Ferocity leads to...</title>
[Defy Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=4522), [Ferocious Beasts](/Feats.aspx?ID=4527), [Incredible Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4526), [Rampaging Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4529), [Undying Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4525)
name: Orc Ferocity
